apps.title: Formulae Pro
apps.blurb: The app if want to study chemistry or maths on the go, or are just a little forgetful with all those important formulas!

apps.title: Analyst
apps.blurb: Want to know more about what your apps do? What version of Android they work best on? Analyst is the tool you want.

apps.title: Jump
apps.blurb: Speed or simplicity. Choose both. Jump is a new take on the launcher - taking it back to the basics of what a launcher should be - a springboard to your apps.

apps.title: Messages
apps.blurb: Want an open-source SMS app? This is the one for you!

apps.title: OxBump & CamBump
apps.blurb: Produced in collaboration with Feather & Square, OxBump and CamBump are the definitive guides to rowing in Oxford and Cambridge

apps.title: Queues
apps.blurb: Queues is an innovative twist on the regular to-do app, highlighting important new methods of creating apps using cross-compilation.

apps.title: Schemer
apps.blurb: Schemer was a simple web-app which built reaction profiles for use in chemistry presentations and papers. Unfortunately, Schemer is no longer available.
